/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car traveling on the highway, giving a sense of motion and journey. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The highway itself is divided by a concrete barrier, providing a sense of safety and order. On either side of the highway, lush green trees and bushes line the road, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few cars can be seen on the road, their colors muted against the bright backdrop. In the distance, a few buildings peek out, hinting at the cityscape beyond. The image is a blend of urban and natural elements, a snapshot of life in a bustling city.
